WorkItem.Description:
We have recived an example of an xls file (BIFF8) created in MS Office Excel where one would get these kind of notices when reading the file with PHPExcel_Reader_Excel5
 
Notice: Uninitialized string offset: 3 in /var/www/phpexcel/Classes/PHPExcel/Reader/Excel5.php on line 4602
 
Notice: Uninitialized string offset: 2 in /var/www/phpexcel/Classes/PHPExcel/Reader/Excel5.php on line 4602
 
Notice: Uninitialized string offset: 3 in /var/www/phpexcel/Classes/PHPExcel/Reader/Excel5.php on line 4602
 
Notice: Uninitialized string offset: 2 in /var/www/phpexcel/Classes/PHPExcel/Reader/Excel5.php on line 4602
 
This is happening because there are some CONTINUE records that are shorter than Excel5 reader expected.
 
Environment:
----
PHPExcel 1.6.6
WorkItem.Summary: Occasional notices with PHPExcel_Reader_Excel5 when Excel file contains drawing elements
